column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////After ordering a little of everything and paying our $70 dollar bill
column3: we was going to eat there but the cafe was full. We only live 7 blocks away so no big deal
column4: the real problem is when we started tasting. The chocolate chip cookie was raw in the middle and tasted like it. The eclair was filled with a bland chocolate cream that left a dirty feeling on my tongue. The chocolate cupcake was overly bitter like a teen girl rebelling against her parents
column5: this cupcake was out to prove it ain't no milk chocolate cupcake. The macarons were awful the few that had taste
column6: tasted like someone baked them to punish someone. (Macarons by Patisse are so much better)
